x4freetext: The RA-6 is a light water-cooled and
moderated material test reactor-type pool reactor.
Its maximum thermal power is 500 kW.
Bromine in the form of KBr with ~99.5% purity was
diluted. The resulting salt concentration was
papers were impregnated with the KBr
solution. Filter papers were dried at room
temperature. Later, each filter was rolled along
with another nonimpregnated one and pressed inside a
matrix, which gave it the final form of a pellet
~2.5 mm thick and 13 mm in diameter.

Seven irradiations were performed. Irradiation times
ranged from ~5 to ~ 6min. Every sample and a
